title: IBM Cloud Pak for Data
introduction: With Cloud Pak for Data you can collect, organize, and analyze your data to generate insights with an extensible, end-to-end platform for governance, analytics, and AI.

links.title: Getting started with IBM Cloud Pak for Data

section_highlights.title: Introducing watsonx.ai Lightweight Engine
section_highlights.description: Starting with the Cloud Pak for Data 5.0.1 release, you can now install a lightweight engine to run watsonx.ai inference in any environment and embed a subset of watsonx.ai features.

section_highlights.title: Db2 and Db2 Warehouse on Cloud Pak for Data
section_highlights.description: With Db2 on Cloud Pak for Data, you can manage your data on a single platform.
